trans-unit.source: Forecasting: Autoregressive Integrated Moving Average (ARIMA) | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: Forecasting: Autoregressive Integrated Moving Average (ARIMA) | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: Forecasting - Autoregressive Integrated Moving Average (ARIMA)
trans-unit.target: Forecasting - Autoregressive Integrated Moving Average (ARIMA)

trans-unit.source: Forecasting - Autoregressive Integrated Moving Average (ARIMA)
trans-unit.target: Forecasting - Autoregressive Integrated Moving Average (ARIMA)

trans-unit.source: This [service]( https://datamarket.azure.com/dataset/aml_labs/arima) implements Autoregressive Integrated Moving Average (ARIMA) to produce predictions based on the historical data provided by the user.
trans-unit.target: This [service]( https://datamarket.azure.com/dataset/aml_labs/arima) implements Autoregressive Integrated Moving Average (ARIMA) to produce predictions based on the historical data provided by the user.

trans-unit.source: Will the demand for a specific product increase this year?
trans-unit.target: Will the demand for a specific product increase this year?

trans-unit.source: Can I predict my product sales for the Christmas season, so that I can effectively plan my inventory?
trans-unit.target: Can I predict my product sales for the Christmas season, so that I can effectively plan my inventory?

trans-unit.source: Forecasting models are apt to address such questions.
trans-unit.target: Forecasting models are apt to address such questions.

trans-unit.source: Given the past data, these models examine hidden trends and seasonality to predict future trends.
trans-unit.target: Given the past data, these models examine hidden trends and seasonality to predict future trends.

trans-unit.source: This web service could be consumed by users – potentially through a mobile app, through a website, or even on a local computer, for example.
trans-unit.target: This web service could be consumed by users – potentially through a mobile app, through a website, or even on a local computer, for example.

trans-unit.source: But the purpose of the web service is also to serve as an example of how Azure Machine Learning can be used to create web services on top of R code.
trans-unit.target: But the purpose of the web service is also to serve as an example of how Azure Machine Learning can be used to create web services on top of R code.

trans-unit.source: With just a few lines of R code and clicks of a button within Azure Machine Learning Studio, an experiment can be created with R code and published as a web service.
trans-unit.target: With just a few lines of R code and clicks of a button within Azure Machine Learning Studio, an experiment can be created with R code and published as a web service.

trans-unit.source: The web service can then be published to the Azure Marketplace and consumed by users and devices across the world with no infrastructure setup by the author of the web service.
trans-unit.target: The web service can then be published to the Azure Marketplace and consumed by users and devices across the world with no infrastructure setup by the author of the web service.

trans-unit.source: Consumption of web service
trans-unit.target: Consumption of web service

trans-unit.source: This service accepts 4 arguments and calculates the ARIMA forecasts.
trans-unit.target: This service accepts 4 arguments and calculates the ARIMA forecasts.

trans-unit.source: The input arguments are:
trans-unit.target: The input arguments are:

trans-unit.source: Frequency - Indicates the frequency of the raw data (daily/weekly/monthly/quarterly/yearly).
trans-unit.target: Frequency - Indicates the frequency of the raw data (daily/weekly/monthly/quarterly/yearly).

trans-unit.source: Horizon - Future forecast time-frame.
trans-unit.target: Horizon - Future forecast time-frame.

trans-unit.source: Date - Add in the new time series data for time.
trans-unit.target: Date - Add in the new time series data for time.

trans-unit.source: Value - Add in the new time series data values.
trans-unit.target: Value - Add in the new time series data values.

trans-unit.source: The output of the service is the calculated forecast values.
trans-unit.target: The output of the service is the calculated forecast values.

trans-unit.source: Sample input could be:
trans-unit.target: Sample input could be:

trans-unit.source: Frequency - 12
trans-unit.target: Frequency - 12

trans-unit.source: Horizon - 12
trans-unit.target: Horizon - 12

trans-unit.source: This service, as hosted on the Azure Marketplace, is an OData service; these may be called through POST or GET methods.
trans-unit.target: This service, as hosted on the Azure Marketplace, is an OData service; these may be called through POST or GET methods.

trans-unit.source: There are multiple ways of consuming the service in an automated fashion (an example app is [here](http://microsoftazuremachinelearning.azurewebsites.net/ArimaForecasting.aspx)).
trans-unit.target: There are multiple ways of consuming the service in an automated fashion (an example app is [here](http://microsoftazuremachinelearning.azurewebsites.net/ArimaForecasting.aspx)).

trans-unit.source: Creation of web service
trans-unit.target: Creation of web service

trans-unit.source: This web service was created using Azure Machine Learning.
trans-unit.target: This web service was created using Azure Machine Learning.

trans-unit.source: For a free trial, as well as introductory videos on creating experiments and [publishing web services](machine-learning-publish-a-machine-learning-web-service.md), please see [azure.com/ml](http://azure.com/ml).
trans-unit.target: For a free trial, as well as introductory videos on creating experiments and [publishing web services](machine-learning-publish-a-machine-learning-web-service.md), please see [azure.com/ml](http://azure.com/ml).

trans-unit.source: Below is a screenshot of the experiment that created the web service and example code for each of the modules within the experiment.
trans-unit.target: Below is a screenshot of the experiment that created the web service and example code for each of the modules within the experiment.

trans-unit.source: From within Azure Machine Learning, a new blank experiment was created.
trans-unit.target: From within Azure Machine Learning, a new blank experiment was created.

trans-unit.source: Sample input data was uploaded with a predefined data schema.
trans-unit.target: Sample input data was uploaded with a predefined data schema.

trans-unit.source: Linked to the data schema is an [Execute R Script][execute-r-script] module, which generates the ARIMA forecasting model by using ‘auto.arima’ and ‘forecast’ functions from R.
trans-unit.target: Linked to the data schema is an [Execute R Script][execute-r-script] module, which generates the ARIMA forecasting model by using ‘auto.arima’ and ‘forecast’ functions from R.

trans-unit.target: Experiment flow:

trans-unit.target: Create workspace

trans-unit.target: Module 1:

trans-unit.target: Module 2:

trans-unit.source: data input
trans-unit.target: data input

trans-unit.source: data <- maml.mapInputPort(1) # class: data.frame
trans-unit.target: data <- maml.mapInputPort(1) # class: data.frame

trans-unit.source: library(forecast)
trans-unit.target: library(forecast)

trans-unit.source: Limitations
trans-unit.target: Limitations

trans-unit.source: This is a very simple example for ARIMA forecasting.
trans-unit.target: This is a very simple example for ARIMA forecasting.

trans-unit.source: As can be seen from the example code above, no error catching is implemented, and the service assumes that all the variables are continuous/positive values and the frequency should be an integer greater than 1.
trans-unit.target: As can be seen from the example code above, no error catching is implemented, and the service assumes that all the variables are continuous/positive values and the frequency should be an integer greater than 1.

trans-unit.source: The length of the date and value vectors should be the same.
trans-unit.target: The length of the date and value vectors should be the same.

trans-unit.source: The date variable should adhere to the format ‘mm/dd/yyyy’.
trans-unit.target: The date variable should adhere to the format ‘mm/dd/yyyy’.
